metadata.description: Comprehensive industry-level e-commerce knowledge base with guardrails, policies, operations, and best practices

guardrails.data_protection: All customer data encrypted at rest and in transit
guardrails.access_control: Role-based access control with audit logging
guardrails.rate_limiting: API rate limits enforced to prevent abuse
guardrails.error_handling: Graceful error handling with no sensitive data exposure

content.return_window: Customers have 30 days from the date of delivery to return items in original condition
eligibility: Items must be unused, unwashed, and in original packaging
Items with tags attached are eligible for return
Personalized or customized items are non-returnable
Digital products are non-refundable unless defective
Gift cards and vouchers are non-refundable
Items marked as 'Final Sale' cannot be returned

refund_process.timeline: Refunds processed within 5-7 business days after receiving returned item
refund_process.method: Refunds issued to original payment method
refund_process.shipping: Original shipping costs are non-refundable unless item was defective or wrong item sent
refund_process.restocking_fee: No restocking fees for standard returns within return window

exceptions: Final sale items marked as 'No Returns'
Items that have been used beyond normal inspection

guardrails.fraud_prevention: Returns monitored for patterns indicating fraud
guardrails.abuse_detection: Excessive returns may result in account review
guardrails.verification: All returns require order number and verification

international_shipping.cost: Calculated at checkout based on weight and destination
international_shipping.customs: Customer responsible for customs duties and taxes
international_shipping.restrictions: Some items restricted by destination country
international_shipping.documentation: All international shipments include customs documentation

delivery_issues.lost_packages: Contact support within 14 days of expected delivery for investigation
delivery_issues.damaged_items: Report within 48 hours with photos for replacement or refund
delivery_issues.wrong_address: Customer responsible if address error, reshipment charges apply
delivery_issues.delayed_delivery: Contact support if delivery exceeds estimated timeframe

guardrails.carrier_verification: Only verified carriers used for shipping
guardrails.tracking_required: All shipments must have tracking numbers

personal_info: Name, email, phone number for account creation
data_collection.third_party: We may share data with payment processors, shipping partners, and analytics providers

data_protection.encryption: All sensitive data encrypted using SSL/TLS and AES-256
data_protection.storage: Data stored in secure, compliant databases with regular backups
data_protection.retention: Data retained as required by law or business needs, typically 7 years for financial records
data_protection.deletion: Data deleted upon request within 30 days, subject to legal requirements
data_protection.rights: Customers can request data access, deletion, or correction at any time

rights: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to opt-out of sale of personal information

guardrails.audit_logging: All data access logged and monitored
guardrails.breach_protocol: Data breach notification within 72 hours as required by law
guardrails.minimal_data: Only collect data necessary for business operations

accepted_methods: Credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover)

security_measures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for all transactions using TLS 1.3
security_measures.fraud_detection: AI-powered fraud detection system with real-time monitoring
security_measures.tokenization: Payment data tokenized, never stored in plain text
security_measures.3d_secure: 3D Secure authentication enabled for additional security

payment_processing.failed_payments: Automatic retry for failed transactions (max 3 attempts)

currency.conversion: Real-time exchange rates applied at checkout

guardrails.transaction_limits: Daily transaction limits enforced per account
guardrails.card_verification: CVV and billing address verification required
guardrails.rate_limiting: Payment attempts rate-limited to prevent abuse

authenticity_guarantee.verified_sellers: All products from verified, authenticated sellers
authenticity_guarantee.certification: Products come with authenticity certificates where applicable
authenticity_guarantee.inspection: Random quality inspections conducted on 10% of inventory
authenticity_guarantee.third_party_verification: High-value items verified by third-party authenticators

quality_standards.new_items: Brand new, factory-sealed items with manufacturer warranty
quality_standards.used_items: Clearly marked with condition rating (Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor)
quality_standards.defects: Defective items replaced or refunded immediately
quality_standards.warranty: Manufacturer warranty applies to eligible products, extended warranty available
quality_standards.recalls: Product recalls handled immediately with customer notification

product_information.descriptions: Accurate, detailed product descriptions with specifications
product_information.images: High-resolution images from multiple angles (minimum 5 images)
product_information.reviews: Customer reviews and ratings displayed (verified purchases only)
product_information.disclaimers: Clear disclaimers for refurbished or used items

guardrails.misrepresentation: False product descriptions result in immediate removal
guardrails.counterfeit_detection: AI-powered counterfeit detection for high-risk categories
guardrails.seller_verification: All sellers must pass identity and business verification

availability.hours: 24/7 customer support via chat, email, and phone

response_time.chat: Average response time: 2 minutes, maximum 5 minutes
response_time.email: Response within 24 hours, typically within 4 hours
response_time.phone: Immediate assistance during business hours (9 AM - 9 PM EST)
response_time.social_media: Response within 2 hours during business hours

availability.languages: Support available in English, Spanish, French, and Mandarin

service_guarantee.satisfaction: 100% satisfaction guarantee or money back within 30 days
service_guarantee.resolution: Issues resolved within 48 hours, complex issues within 7 days
service_guarantee.escalation: Complex issues escalated to senior support team within 24 hours
service_guarantee.compensation: Service failures may result in account credit or discount

guardrails.abuse_prevention: Abusive behavior toward support staff may result in account suspension
guardrails.verification: Account verification required for sensitive operations
guardrails.escalation_criteria: Clear escalation paths for unresolved issues

redemption.expiration: Points expire after 12 months of inactivity
redemption.transfer: Points non-transferable except to family accounts
redemption.restrictions: Points cannot be used with certain promotional codes

guardrails.fraud_prevention: Points earned from fraudulent transactions will be revoked
guardrails.terms_enforcement: Program terms subject to change with 30-day notice

stock_status.pre_order: Available for pre-order, ships on release date
stock_status.discontinued: Product no longer available, no restock planned

restocking.frequency: Daily inventory updates, real-time for high-demand items
restocking.notifications: Email alerts when out-of-stock items become available
restocking.backorders: Backorders accepted with estimated restock date (typically 2-4 weeks)
restocking.cancellation: Backorders can be cancelled with full refund if not yet shipped

pricing.dynamic: Prices may change based on market conditions and demand
pricing.price_match: Price match guarantee within 30 days of purchase (for authorized retailers)
pricing.discounts: Automatic application of applicable discounts and coupons
pricing.price_drops: Price drop protection: refund difference if price drops within 7 days

guardrails.inventory_accuracy: Regular inventory audits to ensure accuracy
guardrails.price_errors: Price errors honored but may be corrected for future orders

seller_requirements.verification: Identity and business verification required (government ID, business license)
seller_requirements.documentation: Business license, tax ID, and bank account verification required
seller_requirements.quality_standards: Must meet platform quality and service standards (4.0+ rating)
seller_requirements.insurance: Product liability insurance required for sellers over $100k annual sales
seller_requirements.background_check: Background check required for high-value sellers

commission_structure.premium: 10% commission for premium sellers with high ratings (4.5+ stars, 1000+ sales)
commission_structure.payment: Payments processed bi-weekly, daily for premium sellers

seller_obligations: Accurate product listings with clear descriptions

guardrails.suspension_criteria: Sellers may be suspended for policy violations, low ratings, or fraud
guardrails.appeal_process: Sellers can appeal suspensions within 30 days

process.step1: Direct communication between parties encouraged (7 days)
process.step2: Platform mediation available upon request (7-14 days)
process.step3: Formal dispute filing with documentation (14 days)

timeline.total_maximum: Maximum 90 days from dispute filing to resolution

resolution_types: Replacement with same or similar item

guardrails.evidence_required: All disputes require supporting evidence (photos, documents)
guardrails.abuse_prevention: Frequent dispute filers may be subject to account review
guardrails.binding_arbitration: Arbitration decisions are binding for both parties

authentication.password_policy: Minimum 8 characters, must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
authentication.2fa_required: 2FA required for high-value transactions and account changes
authentication.session_management: Sessions expire after 30 minutes of inactivity, maximum 24 hours
authentication.login_attempts: Account locked after 5 failed login attempts, unlock via email

data_protection.encryption: All data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3)
data_protection.pii_handling: PII data minimized and only accessed when necessary
data_protection.data_retention: Data retained only as long as necessary for business purposes

api_security.rate_limiting: API rate limits: 100 requests per minute per IP, 1000 per hour
api_security.authentication: API requires authentication token with expiration
api_security.input_validation: All API inputs validated and sanitized
api_security.error_handling: Errors do not expose sensitive information

monitoring.anomaly_detection: AI-powered anomaly detection for suspicious activities
monitoring.audit_logging: All security events logged and retained for 1 year
monitoring.incident_response: Security incidents responded to within 1 hour

review_process.automated: AI-powered content moderation for initial screening
review_process.human_review: Human review for flagged content within 24 hours
review_process.appeal: Content creators can appeal moderation decisions
review_process.escalation: Complex cases escalated to moderation team

enforcement.warnings: First violation: warning and content removal
enforcement.suspension: Repeated violations: temporary account suspension (7-30 days)
enforcement.ban: Severe or repeated violations: permanent account ban

guardrails.transparency: Clear guidelines published and regularly updated
guardrails.appeal_rights: Users have right to appeal moderation decisions

system_level.input_validation: All user inputs validated and sanitized before processing
system_level.output_filtering: All outputs filtered to prevent injection attacks
system_level.error_handling: Errors handled gracefully without exposing system internals
system_level.logging: Comprehensive logging of all operations for audit and debugging
system_level.monitoring: Real-time monitoring of system health and performance

business_level.rate_limiting: Rate limits enforced to prevent abuse
business_level.access_control: Role-based access control with principle of least privilege

compliance_level.gdpr: Full GDPR compliance with data subject rights
compliance_level.pci_dss: PCI DSS Level 1 compliance for payment processing
compliance_level.soc2: SOC 2 Type II certified for security and availability
